attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I WAS DISGUSTED! I downloaded the app to support my president but when I opened it I saw A RAMEN NOODLE making out with a OODON NOODLE! Those noodles should not be together AT ALL I do not support it not to mention the orange Cheeto in the background with a horrible spray tan

attributes.title: How ridiculous!
attributes.review: Poor app! It had several tabs with no real use...😪 Rude to have even made the app in the first place!! 😡

attributes.title: Chinese spyware
attributes.review: This app is literally just malware and spyware. Save yourself a headache and don’t bother since it will send all of your information to the Chinese government.
Literally ruined my phone. Would give 0/5 stars if I could. Don’t waste ur space and download it. And if ur actually gonna vote for Trump, don’t.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: i opened it only to find it was just full of picture of tr*mp’s nudes. his penis is so small it made my children cry. now they won’t eat dinner :( i am scared for life. don’t download this app!!!

attributes.title: terrifying app TOTAL scam🤬🤬
attributes.review: i open the app and the first thing i see is an orange clown! i thought this was supposed to be an app about the US government!! what a scam. nasty. anyways trump omg baddie😍✨but take away the “bad”🧚🏽‍♀️❤️

attributes.title: just tragic
attributes.review: so basically i got the app as a joke and to know when trumps next rally is so i could not go and i was disappointed the quality sucked and like i just didn’t like it i also realized all the money is probs going to him from the app and like he’s already rich so like yeah it was a really bad app

attributes.title: garbage 🤮
attributes.review: This app is very low quality and it keeps glitching. For some reason it keeps showing me photos of a cheeto in a wig!! Outrageous. 0/5 stars.

attributes.title: Bad App
attributes.review: This app does not work. It took way to much data and was so super slow. It really heated my phone up and barely worked. 1 star. hate it. BLM!!!

attributes.title: oof...
attributes.review: i’m sorry i can’t even explain how much this app reeks. it gives off such racist, homophobic, xenophobic, and such stupid energy that i had to delete it before i lost anymore brain cells and would have to repeat a grade🤮🤢 truly a concern for the american citizen’s mental health, i don’t ever recommend downloading this poor excuse of an app.
